Posts.Content: The Drs sent me physical therapy way before I knew they were broken because no one wanted to an X-ray.  So the PT pushed and pulled etc trying to break up scar tissue. So now they think that might of rebroke them.   The radiation stays in your body.  It's something I have to live with.  My muscles between the ribs knot up and all the nerves are exposed and nerves can really hurt.   First find out if they are fractured or broken.  Don't wrap them.  That causes pneumonia they say. Good luck.
Posts.Title: Rib pain months after radiation stops

Posts.Content: I also had pain below my breast after radiation.  For 3 yrs not one Dr did an X-ray until I ended up in the ER.  Had a CT scan and found I had 3 broken ribs.  How?  Radiation.  I have been taking the Zometa infusion to strengthen my bones.  It won't help the ones that were radiated.  I have broken 2 more since then.   Get an X-ray.  There is nothing they can do for it.  Radiation helps one thing and ruins another.
Posts.Title: Rib pain months after radiation stops

Posts.Content: It happened to me too.  3 yrs I was in pain.  Drs wrote it off as other things.  Finally ended up in ER for the pain.  I had 3 severely broken ribs.  Since then I have had 2 more.   They break really easy.  Nothing they can do.  Sucks

Rib pain months after radiation stops

So now they think that might of rebroke them.   The radiation stays in your body.  It's something I have to live with.  My muscles between the ribs knot up and all the nerves are exposed and nerves can really hurt.   First find out if they are fractured or broken.  Don't wrap them.  That causes pneumonia they say. Posts.Title: Rib pain months after radiation stops

Posts.Content: The radiation sucks all the calcium out if the bones in that area.  Therefore, they break easy.  No help for it either.
Posts.Title: Rib pain months after radiation stops

Posts.Content: I have a feeling they will just keep breaking.  Something I have to live with.  It's like the muscles knot up first and then a rib snaos.  All due to radiatiin
